sentences.en: Chinese liquor distil derives from the main body of Chinese rice steamer.
sentences.cn: 它都由中国饭甑为主体而演变成中国酒甑.

sentences.en: Liquor distil is one of the substantial evidences in origin investigation.
sentences.cn: 白酒蒸馏器是研究我国起源的重要实物证据之一.

sentences.en: Most important of all, they to distil Darwin to his essence.
sentences.cn: 更为重要的是, 这些诗还原了达尔文的真我.

sentences.en: The effects of the different concentrations of aqueous extracts were compared to distil water ( control . ).
sentences.cn: 结果表明:不同浓度的含羞草叶子提取物明显影响所选的植物种子根,茎和 侧根 的延长和生长.

sentences.en: The physical method include distil - laing, adsorption, etc.
sentences.cn: 物理方法包括蒸馏法 、 吸附法等.

sentences.en: The whisky had been distilled in 1926 and sat quietly maturing until 1987.
sentences.cn: 这瓶威士忌是1926年被蒸馏的，存放至1987年酿造成熟。

sentences.en: The writer managed to distil his ideas into one succinct article.
sentences.cn: 作家努力把他的想法浓缩成一篇简练的文章.

sentences.en: This began to distil a sense of fear in Marissa.
sentences.cn: 这一点开始在玛莉莎心中产生一种恐惧感.

sentences.en: to distil fresh water from sea water
sentences.cn: 用蒸馏法从海水中提取淡水

sentences.en: Which the clouds do drop and distil abundantly.
sentences.cn: 云彩将雨落下,沛然降与世人.

sentences.en: Which the clouds do drop and distil upon man abundantly.
sentences.cn: 28云彩将雨落下,沛然降与世人.

sentences.en: You can distil fresh water from the sea.
sentences.cn: 你可以用蒸馏法从海水中提取淡水.

sentences.en: You can't actually drink the water from the marshland. But you can distil it.
sentences.cn: 沼泽地的水不能饮用，但是可以将它蒸馏净化。

words.tran_cn: 蒸馏，净化；蒸馏法；精华，蒸馏物
蒸馏；蒸馏物；蒸馏法；精华（等于distilment或者distillation）
蒸馏；滴下；作为精华产生（等于distil）
蒸馏；提取…的精华；使渗出

trans.tran_en: If a liquid such as whisky or water is distilled, it is heated until it changes into steam or vapour and then cooled until it becomes liquid again. This is usually done in order to make it pure.
